meta.title: From STROBE to LIGHTS
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: It's Eurovision week! "Strobe Lights" is a song by Belgium's Red Sebastian. It finished 35th. [Here is their final live performance](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVrsnGFmuss).

ladder.clue: Change a letter in <> to get a pen mark
Drop the first and last letter in <> to get an exclamation
Drop one letter in <> to get a car make
Competitor of <> that shares the same consonants in the same order as <>
Drop a letter in <> to get a homophone of <>
<>-{}, part of many a mea culpa
<>{}, tools for those on the hunt
